trans-unit.source: Basic Settings
trans-unit.target: Basic Settings

trans-unit.source: In this section, you can set up the basic settings for this role.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you can set up the basic settings for this role.

trans-unit.source: Role Name:
trans-unit.target: Role Name:

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: Description:
trans-unit.target: Description:

trans-unit.source: Enter a description of the role.
trans-unit.target: Enter a description of the role.

trans-unit.source: Public Role:
trans-unit.target: Public Role:

trans-unit.source: Check this box if users can subscribe to this role via the Manage Services page of their user account.
trans-unit.target: Check this box if users can subscribe to this role via the Manage Services page of their user account.

trans-unit.source: Auto Assignment:
trans-unit.target: Auto Assignment:

trans-unit.source: Check this box if users are automatically assigned to this role
trans-unit.target: Check this box if users are automatically assigned to this role

trans-unit.source: Advanced Settings
trans-unit.target: Advanced Settings

trans-unit.source: In this section, you can set up more advanced settings for this role.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you can set up more advanced settings for this role.

trans-unit.source: Service Fee
trans-unit.target: Service Fee

trans-unit.source: Enter the fee charged for users in this role.
trans-unit.target: Enter the fee charged for users in this role.

trans-unit.source: Billing Period (Every)
trans-unit.target: Billing Period (Every)

trans-unit.source: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Billing Period. E.g 2 weeks, or 1 month
trans-unit.target: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Billing Period. E.g 2 weeks, or 1 month

trans-unit.source: Trial Fee
trans-unit.target: Trial Fee

trans-unit.source: Enter the trial fee charged for users in this role.
trans-unit.target: Enter the trial fee charged for users in this role.

trans-unit.source: Trial Period (Every)
trans-unit.target: Trial Period (Every)

trans-unit.source: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Trial Period. e.g 2 weeks, or 1 month
trans-unit.target: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Trial Period. e.g 2 weeks, or 1 month

trans-unit.source: Manage Users in this Role
trans-unit.target: Manage Users in this Role

trans-unit.source: You must enter a valid name.
trans-unit.target: You must enter a valid name.

trans-unit.source: Service fee value entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Service fee value entered is not valid.

trans-unit.source: Service fee must be greater than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Service fee must be greater than or equal to zero.

trans-unit.source: Billing period value entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Billing period value entered is not valid.

trans-unit.source: Billing period must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: Billing period must be greater than zero.

trans-unit.source: Trial fee value entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Trial fee value entered is not valid.

trans-unit.source: Trial fee must be greater than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Trial fee must be greater than or equal to zero.

trans-unit.source: Trial period value entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Trial period value entered is not valid.

trans-unit.source: Trial period must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: Trial period must be greater than zero.

trans-unit.source: Edit Security Roles
trans-unit.target: Edit Security Roles

trans-unit.source:
About Edit Security Roles

Administrators can manage the security roles defined for their site. The module allows you to add new security roles, modify existing security roles, delete security roles, and manage the users assigned to security roles.
trans-unit.target:
About Edit Security Roles

Administrators can manage the security roles defined for their site. The module allows you to add new security roles, modify existing security roles, delete security roles, and manage the users assigned to security roles.

trans-unit.source: Role Group:
trans-unit.target: Role Group:

trans-unit.source: Select the role group to which this role belongs.
trans-unit.target: Select the role group to which this role belongs.

trans-unit.source: RSVP Code:
trans-unit.target: RSVP Code:

trans-unit.source: Enter an RSVP Code for the role. Users can easily subscribe to this role by entering this code on the Manage Services page of their user account.
trans-unit.target: Enter an RSVP Code for the role. Users can easily subscribe to this role by entering this code on the Manage Services page of their user account.

trans-unit.source: RSVP Link:
trans-unit.target: RSVP Link:

trans-unit.source: A link that allows users to subscribe to this role will be displayed when an RSVP Code is saved for this role.
trans-unit.target: A link that allows users to subscribe to this role will be displayed when an RSVP Code is saved for this role.

trans-unit.source: Icon:
trans-unit.target: Icon:

trans-unit.source: Select an icon for the role.
trans-unit.target: Select an icon for the role.

trans-unit.source: A role with the same name already exists. The role was not added.
trans-unit.target: A role with the same name already exists. The role was not added.

trans-unit.source: Warning: The Payment Processor settings on the Admin > Site Settings page must be configured to enable fee-base roles/services.
trans-unit.target: Warning: The Payment Processor settings on the Admin > Site Settings page must be configured to enable fee-base roles/services.

trans-unit.source: You must select a billing frequency if you want to enter a fee for this role.
trans-unit.target: You must select a billing frequency if you want to enter a fee for this role.

trans-unit.source: The Name is invalid - roles can not contain the following characters: & $ + , / ? ~ # < > ¿ ¡ « » ! . : * ' [ ]
trans-unit.target: The Name is invalid - roles can not contain the following characters: & $ + , / ? ~ # < > ¿ ¡ « » ! . : * ' [ ]

trans-unit.source: Choose the security mode for this role/group.
trans-unit.target: Choose the security mode for this role/group.

trans-unit.source: Security Mode:
trans-unit.target: Security Mode:

trans-unit.source: Select the status for this role/group.
trans-unit.target: Select the status for this role/group.

trans-unit.source: Status:
trans-unit.target: Status:

trans-unit.source: This role is a system role, only minimal edits allowed.
trans-unit.target: This role is a system role, only minimal edits allowed.

trans-unit.source: Assign this role to all existing users.
trans-unit.target: Assign this role to all existing users.
